name: Nutcracker 64
description:
Join Clara and the Nutcracker on a quest to defeat the Mouse King in the land of sweets.

A game made for the 32bit Holiday Jam 2021 using some of the code from my submission for the last 32bit jam.

Should work with a gamepad, otherwise Arrows to move, z to confirm/interact, x to cancel/open menu.

Programming/Design/Art by me. Music, sound, and cover image by https://kin-sight.itch.io/. Additional art by TheHibiscusPoet.
